Question
========

If *A* = {4,5,6,8} and *B* = {3,5,7,8}, what is the union of *A* and *B*?

Answerlist
----------

* A ∪ B = ∅
* A ∪ B = {3,4,5,6,7,8}
* A ∪ B = {3,4,5,6,8}
* A ∪ B = {4,5,6,7,8}

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A ∪ B = ∅: Incorrect
* A ∪ B = {3,4,5,6,7,8}: Correct
* A ∪ B = {3,4,5,6,8}: Incorrect
* A ∪ B = {4,5,6,7,8}: Incorrect
